title: Interview with Rammstein’s Paul Landers
excerpt: As a lot of you already know, Rammstein’s live DVD, Völkerball, has been released in the US. Following the release, Rammstein guitarist, Paul Landers, did 2 interviews. One by The Gauntlet and the other by Vampirefreaks. In the interviews, Paul talks a little bit about Rammstein’s history and a lot about their future. According to … more →
